Founder of Ghanta Gaming

About Founder

Pradip Adhikari

Founder

Ghanta Gaming, a popular player, has received Facebook's official gaming partnership. It is believed to be the first time that the partnership has been granted to a Nepali streamer streaming in Nepali language on Facebook. Ghanta Gaming mostly streams PUBG Mobile, along with a few other PC games. Since August 2019, the streamer has gained a large following, with around 101 thousand followers on Facebook. Mr. Pradip Adhikari (AKA Ghanta Gaming) got the partner badge from Facebook on June 1, 2021

Mr. Adhikari started his journey from Facebook but later on, he started streaming on YouTube as well. After receiving a partnership offer from Facebook, his main focus has been on streaming on Facebook. He has also been experimenting by uploading gameplay of various other games. But as of now, his main focus is on PUBG

Anjana Parajuli

Founder of Anzypara

streaming journy in 2021 and currently holds 36k+ Followers in her page. She is one of the most entertaining and attractive female Nepali Streamer who always carry a smile on her face.Anzypara mostly plays, PUBG Mobile, GTA V Roleplay, Valorant and few other online/offline games. Her daily live stream contains GTA V Roleplay and PUBG Mobile Rush Gameplay with her friends and with her fans who loves to play with her.

Both players playing those Games
